pathParams.agentId: The ID of the agent to update (from database, e.g., 'clua012jkl...')

body.name: Updated Agent Name
body.persona: Updated persona with new instructions for the AI agent...

notes: All fields are optional - only include fields you want to update
If you change elevenLabsAgentId, make sure the new agent exists in ElevenLabs
Changing phoneNumber to null removes the phone number from the agent
Phone number must be unique across all agents

body.persona: You are now a more casual and friendly agent. Use a conversational tone and feel free to use light humor when appropriate.
